To find more detailed information, visit the website `https://dopomoha.ro/en/integration` and look under the section titled "Integration of refugees from Ukraine to Romania," specifically for the "Hands Across Romania Association" listing.

The NESsT Refugee Employment Initiative provides funding and business assistance to businesses working with refugees in Poland and Romania. This support helps them offer long-term employment, vocational training, quality job opportunities, and comprehensive services like mental health support, language courses, and assistance with work permits.

To find more detailed information, visit the website dopomoha.ro/en/integration and look for the section titled "The NESsT Refugee Employment Initiative".

BERD - Banca Europeană pentru Reconstrucție & Dezvoltare offers business consulting and grant funding to Ukrainian entrepreneurs for companies founded in Romania or for Ukrainian enterprises relocating there. They also provide support for the employment of Ukrainian refugees, including training, language learning, and employment mediation.

To find more detailed information, please visit the webpage and look for the section titled "BERD - Banca Europeană pentru Reconstrucție & Dezvoltare support for SMEs."

HEKS EPER offers employment assistance to Ukrainian refugees, including help with personal branding, job search, CV building, legal support, career counseling, and post-employment support. Refugees can access these services by contacting the team via the provided email addresses or phone numbers, or by scheduling an appointment online via the appointment link.

To find this detailed information on the webpage, look for the section titled "HEKS EPER Employment Support for Ukrainian Refugees" within the "Integration" category.

The National Museum of Rumanian Literature in Bucharest preserves literary treasures such as manuscripts, ancient and rare books, historical-literary documents, special speeches, furniture, plastic mysticism objects, periodicals, photographs, and audio-video recordings. A virtual tour of the museum is available.

To find detailed information, visit the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/integration and look under the "Events and cultural life in Romania" section for "The National Museum of Rumanian Literature in Bucharest".

Yes, there are resources available for writing a resume for job search in English. The Youth Center of the National Youth Foundation offers assistance in compiling CVs and cover letters, and there is a specific section titled "How to write a resume" that provides guidance for an effective job search in English. HEKS EPER also offers CV building support.

To find detailed information, go to the provided webpage and look under the sections "Youth Center of the National Youth Foundation for the Integration of Young People in Romania", "How to write a resume", and "HEKS EPER Employment Support for Ukrainian Refugees".
